about_the_game:
Hunting the past of your ancestry you find yourself washed up on the lands of Solaria. You can feel the magic flowing through the land and the many creatures living alongside one another but there is a tear in the land, the creatures are at ends, there is distrust among the people, can an outsider heal the damage that was done many years ago and discover the secrets of the Solarian Islands.

Survive - Build - Thrive

(The below describes the planned versions of these features that are being worked towards, while in Early Access these features will exist in simpler forms and grow along the way.)

Survive

Landing astray you need to get your bearings. Farm, fish, cook and fight to survive in the wilderness of a magic land.

Your ancestors journal will come in handy but not everything in this land is edible be ready for wild magic, will the herbs let you fly or put you to sleep for the day? Better do your research.

Build

Build complex structures to attract companions to join you and your budding townships, with enough time you'll be able to grow prosperous towns all over Solarian that feed into one another. On the island of the Grave you could build a place of prayer, blessing your towns with the inspiration of the dead, or maybe you're a combatant who prefers to sacrifice demons at the Gravelands to earn your blessing.

Thrive

You've begun to heal the lands but surviving isn't enough, you can have a wood axe but without proper technique you can't craft a Master-grade tool, perfect your crafts and learn from the neighbours to evolve into the territory of thriving.

The islands of Solaria are waiting so get on the ship before it's too late.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 and 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Explore, craft, build and thrive in the magical lands of Solaria. Discover the curse that destroyed these lands and your connection to the past as you grow relationships between clans of magic and monsters, but maybe not all is as it seems?
